snippet: The aide, Ron Barber, will run in a special election but not be a candidate in November, two political leaders say.
abstract: The aide, Ron Barber, will run in a special election but not be a candidate in November, two political leaders say.
lead_paragraph: A top aide to Gabrielle Giffords, the retired Arizona congresswoman, who was wounded in the same mass shooting that nearly took her life is likely to run for her vacated seat in a special election.

headline.main: Giffords's Aide Is Likely to Seek Her Seat
